272 
 
  
EDUCATION ANDMATHEMATICS  
AAU  
AAUA  
ABSU

ADEYEMI

AGBORCOE  
AKSU  
AL-HIKMAH  
AL-QALAM

AOCOE   
BASU  
BAUCHI   
Two(2)'A' 
levelpasses/NCE in 
Mathematics and 
one(1)Science 
subject.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit 
passes to include 
English Language, 
Mathematics plus 
one (1) other 
Science subject.  
  
Mathematics and any two (2) 
ofthe following Science 
subjects: Physics, Chemistry 
and Biology.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) BOWEN, MINNA and RSUST accept NCE/ND//HND, not 
below lower credit in related studies in addition to four 
(4) relevant UTME subjects.  
(ii) RSUST, BSU, MAUTY, OOU and JOS accept NCE in  
relevant subjects not below merit.  
(iii)LASU accepts NCE merit in Mathematics, and one (1)of 
Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Geography/Physics and 
Economics.  
(iv)     LAGOS accepts  
(a) very good passes in three (3) JUPEB subjects: 
Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics and theUTME 
requirements.  
(b) NCE credit/merit in Mathematics and one (1) other 
science subject.  
(v)  IMSU accepts NCE merit in Education and the two (2) 
subject areas into 300 level and below merit into 200 
level.
